name: kensington-konnect-diagnostics-cli-tool
description: Kensington Konnect Diagnostics Tool - Cross-platform CLI tool and Node.js library to collect system logs and device information

scripts.build: npm run build:cli && npm run build:libs
scripts.build-mac-x64: npm run build:cli && node scripts/build-pkg.js macos-x64
scripts.build-mac-arm64: npm run build:cli && node scripts/build-pkg.js macos-arm64
scripts.package-mac-x64: rimraf dist && npm run rebuild-usb-x64 && npm run build-mac-x64 && npm run sign-macos -- --type executable --arch x64 && npm run notarize-macos -- --type executable --arch x64 --no-staple && npm run create-pkg -- x64 && npm run sign-macos -- --type pkg --arch x64 && npm run notarize-macos -- --type pkg --arch x64 && node scripts/zip-and-move.js --os macos --arch x64 --extension pkg
scripts.package-mac-arm64: rimraf dist && npm run rebuild-usb-arm64 && npm run build-mac-arm64 && npm run sign-macos -- --type executable --arch arm64 && npm run notarize-macos -- --type executable --arch arm64 --no-staple && npm run create-pkg -- arm64 && npm run sign-macos -- --type pkg --arch arm64 && npm run notarize-macos -- --type pkg --arch arm64 && node scripts/zip-and-move.js --os macos --arch arm64 --extension pkg
scripts.package-mac:all: npm run package-mac-x64 && npm run package-mac-arm64
scripts.package-mac-app-x64: rimraf dist && npm run rebuild-usb-x64 && npm run build-mac-x64 && npm run create-app -- x64 && npm run sign-macos -- --type app --arch x64 && npm run notarize-macos -- --type app --arch x64 && node scripts/zip-and-move.js --os macos --arch x64 --extension app
scripts.package-mac-app-arm64: rimraf dist && npm run rebuild-usb-arm64 && npm run build-mac-arm64 && npm run create-app -- arm64 && npm run sign-macos -- --type app --arch arm64 && npm run notarize-macos -- --type app --arch arm64 && node scripts/zip-and-move.js --os macos --arch arm64 --extension app
scripts.package-mac-app:all: npm run package-mac-app-x64 && npm run package-mac-app-arm64
scripts.build-win-x64: npm run build:cli && node scripts/build-pkg.js win-x64
scripts.package-win-x64: rimraf dist && npm run rebuild-usb-x64 && npm run build-win-x64 && npm run sign-win -- x64 && node scripts/zip-and-move.js --os win --arch x64 --extension exe

author: JackyLin <loveguitar668@gmail.com>
